attributes.comment:
By raising the fees associated with the I-171H you will place an undue hardship
on families waiting to adopt their children. We are already spending $20,000+ for
the privilege of expanding our families, and adding to that cost is placing an extra
burden on families. We have spent, and continue to spend, months in emotional
turmoil as we await our children. An increase in fees would add to that turmoil and
increase the financial burden on families already stretched to the breaking point.
Please do not increase the fees for the paperwork to bring our long-awaited
children home. Thank you for your consideration.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Rebecca J. Raguso
